data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: I think the best way to show appreciation to someone who did something nice for me is to thank them directly face to face. This shows how sincere you are and what matters is sincerity. This is because when someone helps me, he or she helps me not for getting something in return. She rather helps me because of her kindness. Therefore, it is vital that I thank her wholeheartedly and the way to do that is to thank them in person. Thus, showing your sincerity to people who did something nice for you is the best way to show appreciation.
data.referenceText: What's the best way to show appreciation to someone who did something nice for you?
data.referenceTranslate: 对为你做了好事的人表示感谢的最好方式是什么?
